title: Songs of Sword and Ale - Fantasy Music Pack Vol.1
description: Experience "Songs of Sword and Ale," a fantasy music collection blending lively tavern tunes, epic battle anthems, and ominous melodies for a captivating adventure. Perfect for enhancing your games atmosphere.
longDescription:
"Songs of Sword and Ale" - An Epic Fantasy Soundtrack


  • Preview the music
  • 100% Royalty Free - You can use this music in all your creative work, games, films, etc. THIS ALBUM CANNOT BE REPACKAGED OR RESOLD.


Dive into a world of adventure with "Songs of Sword and Ale," a fantasy music album featuring 20 unique tracks. Perfect for game developers and fantasy enthusiasts, this album offers a versatile soundtrack for any creative project.

Album Features:

  • Tavern Tunes: Capture the lively atmosphere of bustling taverns with joyous and spirited melodies.
  • Epic Battle Anthems: Elevate your scenes with powerful tracks that intensify the excitement of epic battles.
  • Ominous Melodies: Set the mood with haunting tunes that add mystery and suspense to your story.


Start Your Adventure:

Enrich your creative projects with the evocative sounds of "Songs of Sword and Ale" and transport your audience to a realm of imagination and excitement.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Does music loop: no
